oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Demonstration of the Efficacy of a New Leptospira interrogans serovar pomona Antigen in Combination with Campylobacter fetus - Leptospira serovars canicola, hardjo, icterohaemorrhagiae and grippotyphosa by Challenge in Young Cattle
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Conlon, Jennifer
Gallo, Guillermo
Penka, Daniel
Bolin, Carole
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: vaccine
serovar pomona
antigen
Leptospira
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This study was conducted to demonstrate the protection afforded by a vaccine containing a new L. interrogans serovar pomona antigen using an experimental challenge model in cattle.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 2003; 183
